review: This has added to my Comcast experience. I find the same is true with streaming as with Comcast. If you pick your brain and finally decide on a movie you would like to watch on any given evening, when it pops up on the screen, 9 times out of 10 it will be rent or buy. I understand why. If you are in business to make money you offer a poor selection of movies and ask customers to rent or buy the good selection. It's capitalism. At least it gives you the choice of watching or not watching. Sam
